documentation.content:
DEPRECATED: This alert has been replaced with workload-specific alerts:
- alert-api-critical-latency.json (10s threshold for non-AI endpoints)
- alert-ai-extreme-latency.json (120s threshold for AI chat completions)

The old 2-second threshold was inappropriate for AI workloads where 20-60+ second responses are normal for code generation, reasoning, and thinking models.
